articles.author: Harriet Line
articles.title: Jersey fishermen row revealed Britain's reliance on Europe for power - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tony Lodge, a research fellow at the Centre for Policy Studies warned that Britain is offshoring its energy security to Europe, leaving it vulnerable if the Continent's surplus of power is reduced.
articles.content:
The fishing row which saw France threaten to cut off Jersey's power has exposed the 'very dangerous' threat of being too reliant on a foreign supplier for electricity, an expert said yesterday.
Brit… [+10666 chars]

articles.title: Arsenal crash out as Emery's Villarreal seal first-ever European final spot - The42

articles.content:

articles.author: Joel Rabinowitz
articles.title: Harvey Elliott and Joe Gomez could be set to benefit from Liverpool’s Champions League failure - Liverpool.com
articles.description: With Champions League qualification looking increasingly doubtful this season, Liverpool must look for some positives from Europe's second-string competition.
articles.content: After shipping late equalisers against Leeds and Newcastle, Liverpool will, in all likelihood, need to win all five of their remaining Premier League fixtures to stand a chance of securing a top four… [+5931 chars]
